text: Neustadt am Kulm is a municipality in Neustadt an der Waldnaab, in Bavaria, Germany. It is 29 km northwest of Weiden in der Oberpfalz, and 23 km southeast of Bayreuth. Neustadt am Kulm is directly west of the Rauher Kulm. ==References== Category:Neustadt an der Waldnaab (district)
title: Neustadt am Kulm
